Package org.apache.juneau.html

Class HtmlDocSerializerSession

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.ContextSession
org.apache.juneau.BeanSession
org.apache.juneau.BeanTraverseSession
org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession
org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializerSession
org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlSerializerSession
org.apache.juneau.html.HtmlSerializerSession
org.apache.juneau.html.HtmlStrippedDocSerializerSession
org.apache.juneau.html.HtmlDocSerializerSession
Direct Known Subclasses:
HtmlSchemaDocSerializerSession
public class HtmlDocSerializerSession
extends HtmlStrippedDocSerializerSession
Context object that lives for the duration of a single serialization of HtmlSerializer and its subclasses.

See Serializer for details.

  • This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.

    • doSerialize

      protected void doSerialize​(SerializerPipe out, java.lang.Object o) throws java.io.IOException, SerializeException
      Description copied from class: SerializerSession
      Serializes a POJO to the specified pipe.

      This method should NOT close the context object.

      The default implementation of this method simply calls Serializer.doSerialize(SerializerSession,SerializerPipe,Object).

      Overrides:
      doSerialize in class HtmlStrippedDocSerializerSession
      Parameters:
      out - Where to send the output from the serializer.
      o - The object to serialize.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.
      SerializeException - Problem occurred trying to serialize object.

    • parentSerialize

      public void parentSerialize​(java.lang.Object out, java.lang.Object o) throws java.lang.Exception
      Calls the parent doSerialize(SerializerPipe, Object) method which invokes just the HTML serializer.
      Parameters:
      out - Where to send the output from the serializer.
      o - The object being serialized.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Error occurred during serialization.
